Using Ripe

Source: vignettes/ripe.Rmd
ripe.Rmd
library(ripe)

replicate


stats::runif(20)%>%
  ripe(replicate,n=2,simplify=FALSE)
#> [[1]]
#>  [1] 0.70601584 0.45071225 0.37419538 0.07392906 0.03777391 0.66078035
#>  [7] 0.82352370 0.38036860 0.88505017 0.42624563 0.09674389 0.93118509
#> [13] 0.97961434 0.89476233 0.86954444 0.90889708 0.52331027 0.06630530
#> [19] 0.50542043 0.65064001
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>  [1] 0.80583654 0.07518547 0.87353061 0.54642667 0.87377793 0.51034589
#>  [7] 0.28608239 0.27473041 0.97017385 0.32721346 0.27064841 0.05360665
#> [13] 0.74789214 0.83681093 0.64769357 0.14781655 0.22774898 0.21100372
#> [19] 0.31110788 0.05253367

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  ripe(replicate,n=3,simplify=FALSE)
#> [[1]]
#>  [1] 0.76213060 0.76229216 0.37469320 0.83480502 0.73206728 0.39071208
#>  [7] 0.94496896 0.04958134 0.97675357 0.10442407
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>  [1] 0.7329480 0.9531955 0.7262764 0.6228727 0.1183520 0.9410023 0.3154094
#>  [8] 0.8951629 0.4384986 0.2575846
#> 
#> [[3]]
#>  [1] 0.2678289 0.3178839 0.4319573 0.3178626 0.8145669 0.2452532 0.1608685
#>  [8] 0.9891858 0.4287618 0.1173603

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  utils::head(5)%>%
  ripe(replicate,n=4,simplify=FALSE)
#> [[1]]
#> [1] 0.07105824 0.89166279 0.61083820 0.03362870 0.66348061
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] 0.84122566 0.31083134 0.49173753 0.06333522 0.67433028
#> 
#> [[3]]
#> [1] 0.02390981 0.02056153 0.80266092 0.82415654 0.24786365
#> 
#> [[4]]
#> [1] 0.6894867 0.4417779 0.2031975 0.6154979 0.3169703

apply

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  utils::head(5)%>%
  ripe(lapply, X=1:4)
#> [[1]]
#> [1] 0.1913964 0.3365481 0.5067418 0.0706578 0.7616892
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] 0.5241054 0.4499199 0.4503820 0.8070050 0.0741283
#> 
#> [[3]]
#> [1] 0.3963081 0.3993058 0.4127801 0.7089069 0.3544480
#> 
#> [[4]]
#> [1] 0.91617181 0.03393090 0.14310486 0.33139133 0.09017555

mclapply

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  utils::head(5)%>%
  ripe(
    parallel::mclapply,
    X=1:4,
    mc.cores = 2)
#> [[1]]
#> [1] 0.5374309 0.2699421 0.7187258 0.1886156 0.8108981
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] 0.6349181 0.7066638 0.9070694 0.5069692 0.7752549
#> 
#> [[3]]
#> [1] 0.35672469 0.78219967 0.15686102 0.64803949 0.02717433
#> 
#> [[4]]
#> [1] 0.9921093 0.2664799 0.9793809 0.6696081 0.1019400

purrr

iris %>% 
  dplyr::sample_n(5) %>% 
  ripe(purrr::rerun,.n=3)
#> [[1]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width    Species
#> 1          6.2         2.2          4.5         1.5 versicolor
#> 2          4.9         3.1          1.5         0.1     setosa
#> 3          6.6         3.0          4.4         1.4 versicolor
#> 4          5.0         3.4          1.6         0.4     setosa
#> 5          7.0         3.2          4.7         1.4 versicolor
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width    Species
#> 1          6.3         3.3          6.0         2.5  virginica
#> 2          5.5         2.4          3.8         1.1 versicolor
#> 3          5.9         3.0          5.1         1.8  virginica
#> 4          6.0         2.2          4.0         1.0 versicolor
#> 5          5.0         3.5          1.6         0.6     setosa
#> 
#> [[3]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width    Species
#> 1          6.7         3.1          5.6         2.4  virginica
#> 2          6.5         2.8          4.6         1.5 versicolor
#> 3          7.2         3.2          6.0         1.8  virginica
#> 4          5.8         2.7          5.1         1.9  virginica
#> 5          6.0         2.2          4.0         1.0 versicolor

iris %>% 
  dplyr::select(1:2) %>% 
  dplyr::sample_n(20) %>% 
  ripe(purrr::rerun,.n=1)
#> [[1]]
#>    Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1           6.4         3.2
#> 2           5.5         3.5
#> 3           5.1         3.8
#> 4           5.2         4.1
#> 5           4.3         3.0
#> 6           6.1         3.0
#> 7           5.0         3.6
#> 8           6.0         2.2
#> 9           5.3         3.7
#> 10          6.9         3.1
#> 11          5.2         3.4
#> 12          6.5         2.8
#> 13          5.5         4.2
#> 14          6.3         2.7
#> 15          5.7         2.9
#> 16          7.1         3.0
#> 17          5.6         2.8
#> 18          6.4         2.9
#> 19          6.1         3.0
#> 20          5.0         2.3

iris %>% 
  dplyr::select(1:2)%>% 
  dplyr::sample_n(20) %>% 
  dplyr::slice(1:5) %>%
  ripe(purrr::rerun,.n=3)
#> [[1]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1          5.7         2.8
#> 2          5.1         3.8
#> 3          6.3         3.4
#> 4          5.9         3.0
#> 5          6.3         2.3
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1          5.5         2.4
#> 2          7.7         3.8
#> 3          5.2         2.7
#> 4          6.0         3.0
#> 5          5.1         3.8
#> 
#> [[3]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1          6.7         3.1
#> 2          5.9         3.0
#> 3          6.1         3.0
#> 4          5.7         3.0
#> 5          5.0         3.2
